output_list.criticism: In the transfer function, the value of _value is not checked before adding it to the balances of the sender and receiver. If the sum of the balances exceeds the maximum uint256 value, an integer overflow will occur.

In the transferFrom function, the value of _value is not checked before subtracting it from the balances of the sender and receiver. If the subtraction result is negative, an integer underflow will occur.
In the approve function, the value of _value is not checked before adding it to the allowed mapping. If the sum exceeds the maximum uint256 value, an integer overflow will occur.

In the increaseApproval function, the value of _addedValue is not checked before adding it to the current value in the allowed mapping. If the sum exceeds the maximum uint256 value, an integer overflow will occur.

In the decreaseApproval function, the value of _subtractedValue is not checked before subtracting it from the current value in the allowed mapping. If the subtraction result is negative, an integer underflow will occur.
